name: One Room For_ _ _ _?
description:
Can you answer the question? Also, there is definitely only 1 room...

Made for the Indie Tales Game Jam. I didn't spend too much time on this one this time, but hope you guys enjoy my little experiment. Sorry I didn't have time to add any audio :(((.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Right Click - Drop Items

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
